version_description:
=Tutorials=

We have added a set of tutorials that walk new users through the basics of Card View, Grid View, and the Messages screen in the app. These tutorials will show up the first time these screens are visited. Take them for a spin! You might learn something new.

If you ever need a refresher, there's a button on the settings screen that allows you to reset them so that they show up again the next time you go to the relevant screens.

=Interface=

• Fixed a set of issues that were causing badges and the photo indicators in Card View and Profile Details to move out of position and hang lower than they were intended to.

=Tutorials=

We have added a set of tutorials that walk new users through the basics of Card View, Grid View, and the Messages screen in the app. These tutorials will show up the first time these screens are visited. Take them for a spin! You might learn something new.

If you ever need a refresher, there's a button on the settings screen that allows you to reset them so that they show up again the next time you go to the relevant screens.

=Interface=

• Fixed a set of issues that were causing badges and the photo indicators in Card View and Profile Details to move out of position and hang lower than they were intended to.

=Card View=
Card view has received a lot of much needed attention. It should now be more performant and much less buggy! Take it for a spin.

=Interface=
• A bug that was preventing users from accepting invitations to join partnered profiles is now resolved. If you were having a problem accepting an invite, please give it another go.
• The pronouns field was getting pushed around by the "show me with" field in some cases. The two fields have made amends.
• You can no longer enter an infinitely long phone number on the login screen.

=Misc=
• It was possible to get stuck infinitely loading after deleting a solo profile and attempting to create a new one. It shouldn't be anymore.
• Resolved an error some users were running into when attempting to log in.
• Fixed an issue with the signup flow for solo users.

=Card View=
Card view has received a lot of much needed attention. It should now be more performant and much less buggy! Take it for a spin.

=Interface=
• A bug that was preventing users from accepting invitations to join partnered profiles is now resolved. If you were having a problem accepting an invite, please give it another go.
• The pronouns field was getting pushed around by the "show me with" field in some cases. The two fields have made amends.
• You can no longer enter an infinitely long phone number on the login screen.

=Misc=
• It was possible to get stuck infinitely loading after deleting a solo profile and attempting to create a new one. It shouldn't be anymore.
• Resolved an error some users were running into when attempting to log in.
• Fixed an issue with the signup flow for solo users.

=Interface=
• Made it clearer that you don't need to enter your phone number again when opening the app if you are already logged in.
• Made some tweaks to our welcome message.
• Fixed an error in the alphabetization of Gender Identity options.
• You can now tap on the tabs across the top of the screen during signup to edit parts of your profile you have already filled in.
• There is now a loading indicator to let you know when the app is attempting to load profiles.
• Boundaries checkboxes should no longer uncheck and check themselves willy-nilly.
• In some cases the pretend profiles that we show during the Card View tutorial could stick around longer than they were supposed to.
• Addressed some weird behavior that could occur if you interacted with the app repeatedly while finishing a tutorial.
• Tapping on the arrow to see profile details immediately after liking or passing on a profile should no longer cause profile details to close on their own.
• In service of clarity, the "Send code" button (on the login screen) has been renamed "Request code".

=Misc=
• Made the error message for attempting to request a login code with an invalid phone number more user friendly.
• Fixed a bug that could cause an apparent desynchronization between two partners who share a profile when one of them chooses to unmatch.

=Interface=
• Made it clearer that you don't need to enter your phone number again when opening the app if you are already logged in.
• Made some tweaks to our welcome message.
• Fixed an error in the alphabetization of Gender Identity options.
• You can now tap on the tabs across the top of the screen during signup to edit parts of your profile you have already filled in.
• There is now a loading indicator to let you know when the app is attempting to load profiles.
• Boundaries checkboxes should no longer uncheck and check themselves willy-nilly.
• In some cases the pretend profiles that we show during the Card View tutorial could stick around longer than they were supposed to.
• Addressed some weird behavior that could occur if you interacted with the app repeatedly while finishing a tutorial.
• Tapping on the arrow to see profile details immediately after liking or passing on a profile should no longer cause profile details to close on their own.
• In service of clarity, the "Send code" button (on the login screen) has been renamed "Request code".

=Misc=
• Made the error message for attempting to request a login code with an invalid phone number more user friendly.
• Fixed a bug that could cause an apparent desynchronization between two partners who share a profile when one of them chooses to unmatch.

=Interface=
• We've added some tips to walk users through the signup process.
• The See and be seen by section in Boundaries has had a bit of a redesign.
• It should now be clearer when you are already authenticated and don't need to log in again when opening the app.
• Our welcome message received a few tweaks.
• While creating a profile during signup you can now tap on the tabs at the top of the screen to go back to previous steps.
• The buttons that let you like or pass on a profile should now be reenabled more quickly when showing a new profile in Card view.
• Grid view now has an indicator to let you know when it's busy loading profiles to show you.

=Misc=
• Fixed an issue that could cause people's names in chat to desync if they were changed while you were talking to them.
• Made legible a confusing error message that could occur if you entered a phone number that wasn't (a phone number).
• The gender identity options were mistakenly out of order.
• The "Send Code" button on the Login screen has been renamed "Request Code" to avoid confusion.

=Interface=
• We've added some tips to walk users through the signup process.
• The See and be seen by section in Boundaries has had a bit of a redesign.
• It should now be clearer when you are already authenticated and don't need to log in again when opening the app.
• Our welcome message received a few tweaks.
• While creating a profile during signup you can now tap on the tabs at the top of the screen to go back to previous steps.
• The buttons that let you like or pass on a profile should now be reenabled more quickly when showing a new profile in Card view.
• Grid view now has an indicator to let you know when it's busy loading profiles to show you.

=Misc=
• Fixed an issue that could cause people's names in chat to desync if they were changed while you were talking to them.
• Made legible a confusing error message that could occur if you entered a phone number that wasn't (a phone number).
• The gender identity options were mistakenly out of order.
• The "Send Code" button on the Login screen has been renamed "Request Code" to avoid confusion.

=Highlights=
• Anti-imperialists rejoice! You can now choose to use kilometers instead of miles as a distance unit.
• The Boundaries screen has received a partial redesign to make it clearer and more pleasant to interact with.
• The Choose Experience screen (during signup) has been redesigned to present information more clearly.
• We've added some help messages to walk people through the signup process.

=Interface=
• Improved handling of profile images that fail to load the first time.
• Resolved a bug that could sometimes cause Grid View to fail to refresh the state of profiles.
• Entering Settings while performing a search should no longer cause the app to forget what you were searching for.
• Tapping "Done" while entering a hashtag to search for should actually perform the search now.
• The unread messages counter (in the top right) has been taught to count better.
• Profile fields now change their appearance to make it clearer when they have been hidden.
• Fixed an issue that could cause edits to your Boundaries list to not save the first time it was edited.
• The "I already have a code" button on the Login screen now works much better.

=Misc=
• Tapping on a notification for a new message was sometimes throwing an error message.
• The age sliders on the Boundaries screen had a funny habit of drifting ever so slightly.
• Navigating to a profile from an ongoing chat should no longer cause that profile to show the wrong distance.
• If your authorization has expired, you should now be sent back to the Login screen as intended.

=Highlights=
• Anti-imperialists rejoice! You can now choose to use kilometers instead of miles as a distance unit.
• The Boundaries screen has received a partial redesign to make it clearer and more pleasant to interact with.
• The Choose Experience screen (during signup) has been redesigned to present information more clearly.
• We've added some help messages to walk people through the signup process.

=Interface=
• Improved handling of profile images that fail to load the first time.
• Resolved a bug that could sometimes cause Grid View to fail to refresh the state of profiles.
• Entering Settings while performing a search should no longer cause the app to forget what you were searching for.
• Tapping "Done" while entering a hashtag to search for should actually perform the search now.
• The unread messages counter (in the top right) has been taught to count better.
• Profile fields now change their appearance to make it clearer when they have been hidden.
• Fixed an issue that could cause edits to your Boundaries list to not save the first time it was edited.
• The "I already have a code" button on the Login screen now works much better.

=Misc=
• Tapping on a notification for a new message was sometimes throwing an error message.
• The age sliders on the Boundaries screen had a funny habit of drifting ever so slightly.
• Navigating to a profile from an ongoing chat should no longer cause that profile to show the wrong distance.
• If your authorization has expired, you should now be sent back to the Login screen as intended.

• Starting a new chat with someone and then not sending a message should no longer leave an empty chat hanging around.
• Fixed an issue that caused notifications about new matches not to show up when the app wasn't open.

• Starting a new chat with someone and then not sending a message should no longer leave an empty chat hanging around.
• Fixed an issue that caused notifications about new matches not to show up when the app wasn't open.

• Refreshing Grid View (by pulling down) now works more better.
• Fixed a bug that could cause avatars not to load in a chat if the initial message was sent from the Match screen.
• Sorted out a crash that sometimes occurred when attempting to unmatch a new connection in the Messages screen.
• Selecting the "None (blank)" option for a profile field now hides that field as expected.
• Choosing a location we can't find in the Travel Planner now gives a more helpful error message.
• Added the version number to the login screen to make it easier to tell what version you are on if you aren't logged in (if you *are* logged in you can also find it in Settings>Profile>About #open)

• Refreshing Grid View (by pulling down) now works more better.
• Fixed a bug that could cause avatars not to load in a chat if the initial message was sent from the Match screen.
• Sorted out a crash that sometimes occurred when attempting to unmatch a new connection in the Messages screen.
• Selecting the "None (blank)" option for a profile field now hides that field as expected.
• Choosing a location we can't find in the Travel Planner now gives a more helpful error message.
• Added the version number to the login screen to make it easier to tell what version you are on if you aren't logged in (if you *are* logged in you can also find it in Settings>Profile>About #open)
• Added a minimum version check to ensure that users are on a compatible version of the app.
• Added a minimum version check to ensure that users are on a compatible version of the app.

Interface
• The order of the buttons on the settings screen has been made a bit more logical.
• Things should no longer break if you decide to skip the partnered profile after selecting Solo + Partnered signup.
• Sorted out some other issues with the Solo + Partnered signup flow.
• Addressed an issue that caused the save button while editing a profile to show up in the wrong place.
• Fixed an issue that could cause you to be asked to agree to the rules multiple times.
• Chat should more consistently show the avatar of people you are chatting to.

Interface
• The order of the buttons on the settings screen has been made a bit more logical.
• Things should no longer break if you decide to skip the partnered profile after selecting Solo + Partnered signup.
• Sorted out some other issues with the Solo + Partnered signup flow.
• Addressed an issue that caused the save button while editing a profile to show up in the wrong place.
• Fixed an issue that could cause you to be asked to agree to the rules multiple times.
• Chat should more consistently show the avatar of people you are chatting to.
Updated the app to ignore dark mode on iOS 13 until we can add proper support.
Updated the app to ignore dark mode on iOS 13 until we can add proper support.

• The login screen has received a major rework! It should be less difficult to use, less cluttered, and more pretty.
• We've removed the last active indicator that was displayed on profiles in-app while we evaluate its impact on user privacy.

Interface
• Fixed an issue with the validation messages when reporting a profile not showing up consistently.
• Sorted out a problem with the profile photos not loading properly for profiles under some specific conditions.

• The login screen has received a major rework! It should be less difficult to use, less cluttered, and more pretty.
• We've removed the last active indicator that was displayed on profiles in-app while we evaluate its impact on user privacy.

Interface
• Fixed an issue with the validation messages when reporting a profile not showing up consistently.
• Sorted out a problem with the profile photos not loading properly for profiles under some specific conditions.

• Fixed an issue with chatting from a partnered profile in some fairly specific circumstances.
• Fixed a bug with New Connections (in Messages) sometimes showing the wrong thumbnails.
• Fixed an issue with the behavior of the #open logo at the top of the screen when you don't have a second profile to switch to.
• Fixed an issue with hashtag lists not showing up when accessing the preferences screen in some circumstances.
• An option was accidentally missing from the Pronouns field.

• Fixed an issue with chatting from a partnered profile in some fairly specific circumstances.
• Fixed a bug with New Connections (in Messages) sometimes showing the wrong thumbnails.
• Fixed an issue with the behavior of the #open logo at the top of the screen when you don't have a second profile to switch to.
• Fixed an issue with hashtag lists not showing up when accessing the preferences screen in some circumstances.
• An option was accidentally missing from the Pronouns field.

• Added links to our Community Guidelines to the Rules screens
• Fixed an issue with the hashtag you searched for not being highlighted
• Updated the Rules, Permissions, Welcome, and Choose Experience screens to work a little better and look a little better

• Added links to our Community Guidelines to the Rules screens
• Fixed an issue with the hashtag you searched for not being highlighted
• Updated the Rules, Permissions, Welcome, and Choose Experience screens to work a little better and look a little better

• The Rules (Play Nice) help should no longer show up more than once
• Sorted out validation of Canadian phone numbers
• Searching for a hashtag should now appropriately highlight the hashtag you searched for when viewing profiles in the search results
• Addressed an issue with the signup flow for partners invited by phone number

• The Rules (Play Nice) help should no longer show up more than once
• Sorted out validation of Canadian phone numbers
• Searching for a hashtag should now appropriately highlight the hashtag you searched for when viewing profiles in the search results
• Addressed an issue with the signup flow for partners invited by phone number

Recent events have reminded us all that connection is more important than proximity, so we have done away with distance restrictions.
Card view and Grid view always display profiles in order of their approximate distance from your device or travel location.
The real power is in hashtag search (bottom left) to find all profiles within your boundaries that contain the hashtag you enter. Try it out!

The real power is in hashtag search (bottom left) to find all profiles within your boundaries that contain the hashtag you enter. Try it out!

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

We have new ways to help you connect with other #open members!

Supporting Membership
Become a member to get special features including:
- See who Likes You
- Unrestricted access to the PowerGrid’s robust search features
- 15 Sparks to let others know that you’re interested in them

Sparks
Wanna catch someone’s attention? Send them a Spark! These single-use tokens help your profile stand out & automatically create a match if they like your profile.
Sparks come in a pack of 3, or get 15 each month included with your Supporting Membership.
